name: ASCEND (itch) (Kacper Garbacz, Wojciech Starowicz)
description:
As a bit of data your only goal is to corrupt data.

Controls:

WSAD - Movement
R - Change Ability
RMB - Use ability
C - Slide
SHIFT - Sprint

Assets used:
Skyscraper 8 - Adobe Stock
Chameleon Post Process - Unreal Engine Marketplace

Know Bugs:

- sprites doesn't face the player in correct way
- in-game menu (ESC) doesn't really do anything, you can't change music/sfx volume
- same goes to main menu - you can change volume of music/sfc, but it's gonna reset after starting the game
- second checkpoint is really small, and you need to get really close to the big "CHECKPOINT" text in order to activate it
- there's no mouse visible in win screen, but it is there, really
- really weird dash boost if you dash after slide
-  you might have a high GPU usage
- timer doesn't work in a way that a regular timer would work, but at least it looks cool

Team:
- Wojciech "Pupek" Starowicz - Programming, bug fixing after the guy on the bottom
- Kacper "Stridmon" Garbacz - Music, Sound Effects, Graphics, Level Design, breaking stuff that guy above created



Special thanks for GitHub and SourceTree, our loyal partners that were working with us flawlessly, and did not broke our build 3 hours before deadline.
